name.baseName: The production of CLT ; Cross-Laminated Timber (CLT) ; 1 m3 of CLT is comprised of the following: Softwood lumber: 428 odkg (462 kg @ 8% M.C.); Resins: 2.7 kg; Total mass: 464.7 kg
CLT ;交叉层压材（CLT）;1 m3 CLT的生产包括：软木：428 odkg（462 kg@8%M.C.）；树脂：2.7千克；总质量：464.7 kg

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The Athena Sustainable Materials Institute was commissioned by the Forestry Innovation Investment to conduct a cradle-to-gate LCA of BC CLT production. CLT is a category of framing styles characterized by the use of solid wood panels for wall, floor, and roof construction.
Athena可持续材料研究所受林业创新投资公司委托，对不列颠哥伦比亚省CLT生产进行从摇篮到大门的LCA。CLT是一类框架样式，其特点是在墙壁、地板和屋顶结构中使用实木面板。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The purpose of the functional unit is to quantify the service delivered by the product system and provide a reference to which the inputs and outputs can be related. For EPDs covering the complete life cycle (based on a “cradle-to-grave” LCA study), a functional unit is defined. For EPDs not covering the complete life cycle (e.g. “cradle-to gate” LCA study -leaving out the use and/or the end of life), a declared unit is defined. The declared unit is defined as “the production of one cubic meter (1 m3) of CLT produced in British Columbia.”

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Based on the secondary data sources part of the report, the data quality of Kiln-dried Softwood Lumber can be good within one year.
根据报告的二手数据来源部分，窑干软木木材的数据质量可以在一年内保持良好。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: “The surveyed data is representative of the BC CLT industry as the 3 surveyed facilities represent all currently operating CLT manufacturing facilities in BC.”
调查数据代表加拿大不列颠哥伦比亚省CLT行业，因为3家调查工厂代表不列颠哥伦比亚目前所有运营的CLT制造工厂。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The whole production process of CLT can be divided into three parts-A1, A2, and A3:“A1 includes the cradle-to-gate production of lumber and resins that are used in CLT manufacture. The upstream resource extraction includes removal of raw materials and processing, processing of secondary material input (e.g., recycling processes) after crossing the system boundary of the previous product system. A1 also includes reforestation processes that include nursery operations (which include fertilizer, irrigation, energy for greenhouses if applicable etc.), site preparation, as well as planting, fertilization, thinning and other management operations.”“For A2-Transportation to factory: Average or specific transportation of raw materials (including secondary materials and fuels) from extraction site or source to manufacturing site (including any recovered materials from source to be recycled in the process);”“In terms of A3, manufacturing of the CLT product, including packaging.”

CLT的整个生产过程可分为三部分——A1、A2和A3：A1包括CLT制造中使用的木材和树脂的从摇篮到大门的生产。上游资源开采包括原材料的去除和加工，以及在越过以前产品系统的系统边界后对二次材料输入的处理（例如回收过程）。A1还包括包括苗圃作业在内的重新造林过程（包括肥料、灌溉、温室能源（如适用）等）、场地准备以及种植、施肥、间伐和其他管理操作。对于A2运输到工厂：原材料（包括二次材料和燃料）从提取现场或来源到制造现场的平均或特定运输（包括在过程中回收的任何来源的材料）；就A3而言，CLT产品的制造，包括包装。
technology.technologicalApplicability: Cross-Laminated Timber (CLT) is used as a structural material in building construction for walls, floors, and roofs. It is characterized by its solid wood panel composition, providing a sustainable and strong alternative in modern construction, suitable for residential, commercial, and institutional buildings.
交叉层压材（CLT）被用作建筑施工中的结构材料，适用于墙体、地板和屋顶。它以实木面板的组成而著称，为现代建筑提供了一种可持续且坚固的替代品，适用于住宅、商业和公共机构建筑。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: "Allocation is the method used to partition the environmental load of a process when several products or functions share the same process. CLT manufacturing is a single output process, where the CLT is the only product that is produced. The CLT manufacturing process does produce wood waste that is transferred for free to downstream users, but no environmental burden has been allocated to these wastes. The lumber input to the CLT manufacturing process is, however, a product that results from a multiple output process whereby valuable coproducts are produced and sold. In accordance with UL PCRs, “mass” was deemed as the most appropriate parameter for allocation of these inputs and thus the “mass allocation” results incorporate lumber data based on mass allocation. A detailed explanation of the lumber allocation methodology is provided in the lumber LCA project report” (Athena Sustainale Materials Institute, 2021, p. 8)

分配是指当几个产品或功能共享同一过程时，用于划分过程的环境负荷的方法。CLT制造是一个单一的输出过程，其中CLT是唯一生产的产品。CLT的制造过程确实产生了免费转移给下游用户的木材废物，但没有为这些废物分配环境负担。然而，CLT制造过程中的木材输入是一种由多输出过程产生的产品，通过该过程生产和销售有价值的副产品。根据UL PCR，“质量”被认为是分配这些输入的最合适参数，因此“质量分配”结果包含了基于质量分配的木材数据。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: There are three information modules accounted for in this LCA study."Extraction and upstream production” includes the cradle-to-gate production of the softwood lumber feedstock as well as the production of all resins and ancillary materials used in the production of CLT."Transportation to factory” for all plants was by diesel tractor-trailer truck. The participating CLT facilities provided the transportation distances and mode of transportation for the facility inputs."Manufacturing” LCI data was gathered from a total of three plants all currently operating in BC.
本LCA研究涉及三个信息模块。“提取和上游生产”包括软木原料的从摇篮到大门的生产，以及CLT生产中使用的所有树脂和辅助材料的生产。所有工厂的“工厂运输”均采用柴油牵引拖车。参与的CLT设施提供了设施投入的运输距离和运输方式。“制造业”LCI数据来自不列颠哥伦比亚省目前运营的三家工厂。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: “In the LCIA, the LCI flow of biogenic carbon removal is characterized with a factor of -1 kg CO2e/kg CO2 of biogenic carbon in the calculation of the GWP1. Likewise, the LCI flow of biogenic carbon emission is characterized with a factor of +1 kg CO2e/kg CO2 of biogenic carbon in the calculation of the GWP. Emissions other than CO2 associated with biomass combustion (e.g., methane or nitrogen oxides) are characterized by their specific radiative forcing factors in the calculation of the GWP.”“We have thus manually calculated the component of the global warming potential related to biogenic carbon separately.”“For this study, the impact categories and characterization factors (CF)2 from the mid-point indicators of the U.S. EPA Tool for the Reduction and Assessment of Chemical and Other Environmental Impacts – TRACI 2.1 [3] were applied. The TRACI methodologies were developed specifically for the US using input parameters consistent with US locations and are consistent with the wood product PCR Part A.”“The total primary energy consumption is tabulated from the LCI results based on the Cumulative Energy Demand Method published by ecoinvent3. Lower heating value of primary energy carriers is used to calculate the primary energy values reported in the study”“Other inventory parameters concerning material use, waste, water use and biogenic carbon were drawn from the LCI results. We followed the ACLCA’s Guidance to Calculating non-LCIA Inventory Metrics in Accordance with ISO 21930:2017”“Based on the data availability, an approach using average weighting factors was applied is this LCA study.”

在LCIA中，在计算GWP1时，生物碳去除的LCI流量以-1 kg CO2e/kg CO2的生物碳为特征。同样，在全球变暖潜能值的计算中，生物碳排放的LCI流量以+1 kg CO2e/kg CO2的生物碳因子为特征。与生物质燃烧相关的二氧化碳以外的排放（如甲烷或氮氧化物）在全球升温潜能值的计算中以其特定的辐射强迫因子为特征。我们分别手动计算了与生物碳相关的全球变暖潜力的组成部分。在本研究中，影响类别和特征因子（CF）2来自美国环保局减少和评估化学和其他环境影响工具TRACI 2.1的中点指标应用。TRACI方法是专门为美国开发的，使用与美国位置一致的输入参数，并与木制品PCR第A部分一致。一次能源消耗总量是根据ecoinvent3发布的累积能源需求法根据LCI结果制成的。一次能量载体的低热值用于计算研究中报告的一次能量值。与材料使用、废物、水使用和生物碳有关的其他库存参数来自LCI结果。我们遵循了ACLCA根据ISO 21930:2017计算非LCIA库存指标的指南。根据数据可用性，采用了一种使用平均加权因子的方法。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Athena Sustainale Materials Institute. A Cradle-to-Gate Life Cycle Assessment of CLT produced in British Columbia. (2021).
Athena Sustainale Materials Institute. A Cradle-to-Gate Life Cycle Assessment of CLT produced in British Columbia. (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data should consider the specific details of the CLT production process in British Columbia, including the materials and energy flows involved from cradle-to-gate. The data focuses on the production stages (upstream activities, transportation, and manufacturing, including packaging) but does not include use or end-of-life stages. Data users must ensure that recycling, energy recovery, and waste treatment processes for CLT are modeled according to local specificities if expanding beyond gate-to-gate. Environmental impacts from capital equipment and human activities are excluded and should be considered if relevant for the expanded system boundary. Always refer to the latest standards and apply up-to-date characterization factors when conducting an LCA with this data.

使用此数据的用户应考虑不列颠哥伦比亚省CLT生产过程的具体细节，包括从摇篮到大门涉及的材料和能源流。数据聚焦于生产阶段（上游活动、运输和包括包装的制造）但不包括使用或生命周期终止阶段。如果将评估扩展到大门到大门以外，数据的用户必须确保针对CLT的回收、能量回收和废物处理过程根据当地具体情况进行建模。资本设备和人类活动的环境影响被排除在外，如果对于扩展的系统边界有关，应予以考虑。在使用此数据进行生命周期评估时，始终应参考最新的标准并应用最新的特征化因子。

completeness.common:other: This is a “cradle-to gate” LCA study -leaving out the use and/or the end of life.Both human activity and capital equipment were excluded from the system boundary. The environmental effects of manufacturing and installing capital equipment and buildings have generally been shown to be minor relative to the throughput of materials and components over the useful lives of the buildings and equipment.The cut-off criteria for all activity stage flows considered within the system boundary conform with ISO 21930: 2017 Section 7.1.8. Specifically, the cut-off criteria were applied as follows:• All inputs and outputs for which data are available are included in the calculated effects and no collected core process data are excluded.• A one percent cut-off is considered for renewable and non-renewable primary energy consumption and the total mass of inputs within a unit process. The sum of the total neglected flows does not exceed 5% of all energy consumption and mass of inputs.• All flows known to contribute a significant impact or to uncertainty are included.• The cut-off rules are not applied to hazardous and toxic material flows – all of which are included in the life cycle inventory.No material or energy input or output was knowingly excluded from the system boundary.Biogenic carbon enters the product system (removal) as primary or secondary material. The carbon removal is considered a negative emission. The biogenic carbon leaves the system (emission) as product, coproducts, and directly to the atmosphere when combusted. These mass flows of biogenic carbon from and to nature are listed in the LCI and expressed in kg CO2.

这是一项“从摇篮到大门”的生命周期评价研究，忽略了产品的使用和/或结束。人力活动和资本设备都被排除在系统边界之外。在建筑物和设备的使用寿命内，制造和安装资本设备和建筑物的环境影响通常相对于材料和部件的吞吐量较小。系统边界内考虑的所有活动阶段流量的截止标准符合ISO 21930:2017第7.1.8节。具体而言，采用的截止标准如下：•所有可用数据的输入和输出都包含在计算的影响中，不排除收集的核心工艺数据。•可再生和不可再生一次能源消耗以及单位工艺中投入的总质量考虑1%的截止值。被忽略的总流量之和不超过所有能源消耗和投入质量的5%。•包括所有已知会造成重大影响或不确定性的流量。•截止规则不适用于危险和有毒物质流——所有这些都包含在生命周期清单中。没有任何材料或能量输入或输出被故意排除在系统边界之外。生物碳作为主要或次要材料进入产品系统（去除）。碳去除被认为是负排放。生物碳作为产物、副产物离开系统（排放），燃烧时直接进入大气。LCI中列出了这些来自和流向自然的生物碳质量流量，并以kg CO2表示。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The "lumber" is selected here from the database, which substitutes for the "BC softwood lumber" in the report.
这里从数据库中选择“木材”，该数据库替代了报告中的“BC软木木材”。
The "polyether polyol" is selected here from the database, which substitutes for the "Polyurethane" in the report.
“聚醚多元醇”是从数据库中选择的，该数据库替代了报告中的“聚氨酯”。

The "Urea-formaldehyde" is selected here from the database, which substitutes for the "Resin Hardener (Melamine Formaldehyde Hardener" in the report. Urea-formaldehyde has similar properties to melamine formaldehyde hardener.
“尿素甲醛”是从数据库中选择的，该数据库替代了报告中的“树脂硬化剂（三聚氰胺甲醛硬化剂）”。尿素甲醛与三聚氰胺甲醛硬化剂具有类似的性质。
Refers to "lumber trucking" in the report.
报告中提到“木材卡车运输”。
Refers to the "Resins Trucking" in the report.
指报告中的“树脂运输”。

The "polyethylene" is selected here from the database, which substitutes for the "Packaging (Plastic strapping)" in the report. Based on the report, "Packaging (Plastic strapping)" refers to high density polyethylene resin.
“聚乙烯”是从数据库中选择的，该数据库替代了报告中的“包装（塑料捆扎）”。根据报告，“包装（塑料捆扎）”是指高密度聚乙烯树脂。

The "polypropylene" is selected here from the database, which substitutes for the "Packaging (Lumber wrap)" in the report. Based on the report, "Packaging (Lumber wrap)" refers to polypropylene resin.
“聚丙烯”是从数据库中选择的，该数据库替代了报告中的“包装（木材包装）”。根据报告，“包装（木材包装）”是指聚丙烯树脂。
Refers to "Consumables Trucking" in the report.
报告中提到“耗材卡车运输”。
The "wood waste" is selected here from the database, which substitutes for the "Waste Transferred for Free (Recycled and Hogfuel)" in the report.
“木材废料”是从数据库中选择的，该数据库替代了报告中的“废物免费转移（回收和猪肉燃料）”。
Refers to the "Particulates Other" flow in the report.
指报告中的“颗粒物其他”流程。
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil
Refers to "1,4-Butanediol" in the report.
报告中提到的“1,4-丁二醇”。
